original_text: And as soon as Jeroboam the son of Nebat heard of it (for he was still in Egypt, where he had fled from King Solomon), then Jeroboam returned from Egypt.
korean_text: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 전에 솔로몬 왕의 얼굴을 피하여 애굽으로 도망하여 있었더니 이제 그 소문을 듣고 여전히 애굽에 있는 중에

sentences.original_text: And as soon as Jeroboam the son of Nebat heard of it
sentences.korean_translation: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 그 일을 듣자마자

sentences.original_text: for he was still in Egypt
where he had fled from King Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 솔로몬 왕에게서 도망하여 애굽에 있었던 것이다
